document_data.caption: A map showing the Street of Smiths and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Street of Smiths
document_data.starts: [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Smiths''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Street of Smiths was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. The road ran east to west, connecting the much larger [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]] with the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]].
document_data.Notable Locations: Several small unnamed alleys branched off of the southern side of the Street of Smiths.
